notes.text:
This update for rear23a fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-23301: Corrected world-readable permissions for initrd,
  which could be an issue if it contains sensitive information
  (bsc#1218728).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Relax-and-Recover (aka ReaR) through 2.7 creates a world-readable initrd when using GRUB_RESCUE=y. This allows local attackers to gain access to system secrets otherwise only readable by root.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
